headline: Block Job Cuts And Business Overhaul Contrast With Undervalued Share Price
summary: Block, Inc. (NYSE:XYZ) is reportedly preparing workforce reductions of up to 10%. The cuts are expected to affect hundreds of employees across Cash App and Square. The reported reductions are part of a broader overhaul of Block's business operations. Block, Inc. (NYSE:XYZ) operates across digital payments, merchant services and consumer finance through its Square and Cash App units. The reported workforce cuts come as the wider fintech sector faces intense competition and rapid shifts in...

headline: Jack Dorsey’s Block looking to cut up to 10% of workforce in latest efficiency push: Bloomberg
summary: The cuts come less than a year after the company laid off 931 employees in March 2025, and ahead of its Q4 earnings report on Feb. 26.

raw.headline: Jack Dorsey’s Block looking to cut up to 10% of workforce in latest efficiency push: Bloomberg

headline: How crypto miners are decoupling from bitcoin for AI
summary: Macquarie Capital senior equity research analyst Paul Golding shares his insights into how fintech platforms and cryptocurrency miners, such as Block (XYZ) and MARA Holdings (MARA), are expected to react to sliding bitcoin prices (BTC-USD) and consistent headwinds in the crypto space. Also catch Paul Golding react to PayPal's (PYPL) latest earnings release and guidance figures. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Block weighs cutting up to 10% of jobs: Bloomberg
summary: The company has told hundreds of employees their jobs are at risk as part of a broader overhaul.
